GORILLAZ

I've worked on the Gorillaz website for 6 years, in that time we re-developed the site three times. My role was extensive, from creative ideas to co-developing the online adventure game 'Plastic Beach'. I designed the current look of the site and developed it in a team of three. The site had a membership system with the option of premium accounts based on a yearly payment.

I produced flash and Canvas (HTML5) based games, e-newsletters and customer support.

This site involved:

  • Flash (Actionscript 3.0)
  • HTML and HTML5
  • CSS
  • PHP and ASP
  • Javascript
  • SQL and MySQL
  • Photoshop and GIMP
  • Final Cut Pro
  • Multiple encoders for online videos
  • XML
  • JSON
  • AJAX

gorillaz.com
